not_configured_yet: E le'i fa'atulagaina le faiga. O le a fesoasoani lenei wizard seti ia te oe i le faʻaleleia o lau masini ma faʻagaoioia i ni nai laasaga.
system_config_include_demo: Fa'aaofia fa'ata'ita'iga fa'atasi ai ma gaioiga fa'ata'ita'i masini
dashboard_from_group: Fausia se dashboard mai le vaega lea
empty_group: Leai ni modules i lenei vaega.
cronwizard_schedule_set_exact_time: Seti le taimi o mea e fai.
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Amata i le {{start}} .
 Seti le fa'ai'uga ole taimi.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Fa'amatala ituaiga ma modules e fa'atatau i lenei fa'atulagaga (filifiliga)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Fa'atu le gaioiga e fa'atino i mea tutupu o lenei mea
cronwizard_action_preset_slot_start: I le amataga o se taimi avanoa
cronwizard_action_preset_slot_end: I le faaiuga o se taimi avanoa
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Fa'aaoga @ {{name}} e fai ma sui i fa'amatalaga cron pe fa'aaoga Scheduler.IsScheduling("@ {{name}}") i polokalame otometi e fa'asino i lenei mea.
enable_to_run_program: Fa'aaga le polokalame ina ia fa'agaoioia
main_code_empty_note: "Main" code e gaogao. Fa'aaogā le fa'atonu "Visual code" e fa'atupu ai lenei fa'ailoga: - Tatala le vaega "Polokalame" mai le palette o le fa'atonuga i le itu agavale - Toso se poloka o le ituaiga "Main" i le va'aiga fa'ailoga va'aia - Fa'aopoopo i totonu isi poloka fa'ailoga e fa'atino ai gaioiga ma le fa'atatau o lenei polokalame O le polokalame "Main" e mafai ona fa'atino ma le lima po'o le fa'amataina otometi e fa'atatau i tu'utu'uga e tu'uina atu i le Setup code.
setup_code_empty_note: "Setup" code e avanoa. Fa'aoga le fa'atonu "Visual code" e fa'atupu ai lenei fa'ailoga: - Tatala le vaega "Polokalame" mai le palette o le fa'atonuga i le agavale - Toso se poloka o le ituaiga "Setup" i le va'aiga fa'ailoga va'aia - Fa'aopoopo i totonu isi poloka fa'ailoga e iloa ai tulaga e fa'aosoina ai le "Main" code execution.
capture_commands_description: Fa'aopoopo uma fa'atonuga e faia ma le lima i luga o widgets i le polokalame.
capture_commands_pause: Taofi i le va o poloaiga

16.Title: Fa'amanatuga Tulaga
16.Description: Teu ma manatua le tulaga faanenefu mulimuli.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Toe manatua le tulaga moli mulimuli pe a ki

34.Title: Va'aiga o le Tau
34.Description: Tau ma fa'amatalaga fa'amatalaga mai le tautua Open Weather Map. Ina ia fa'agaoioia lenei widget ulufale i se ki API aoga. Mulimuli i faatonuga ile https://openweathermap.org/appid e maua ai se ki API e leai se totogi.

77.Title: Fesootaiga MQTT
77.Description: Feso'ota'i ile MQTT broker e fa'aoga le HomeGenie Panel app mai so'o se mea e ala ile Initaneti pe fa'afeso'ota'i masini HomeGenie ile feso'otaiga MQTT tutusa.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Fa'asalalau mea na tutupu na fa'aolaina e lenei module
77.ConfigureOptions.Encryption: Fa'amalo le fa'ailoga pito i tua (E2EE)

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Fa'aaogā so'o se mea e iloa ai le vevela ma se ki fa'aoga atamai e fa'atino ai galuega fa'atino.

81.Title: Mataituina Malosiaga
81.Description: Fausia fa'amaumauga ile fa'aogaina ole malosi ma le fa'aogaina o masini.
81.EnergyManagement.MonitorWatts: Mataʻituina le faʻaaogaina o le malosi

82.Title: Faiga Fa'asao Malosi
82.Description: Taofi le maualuga o le moli i lalo ifo o se pasene e mafai ona fetuunai.

90.Title: Faiga Fa'ailoga Puipuiga
90.Description: Fa'aoga masini ma isi masini e fa'atino ai se faiga fa'ailo saogalemu.
90.HomeGenie.SecuritySensor: Fa'aoga e fai ma fa'amautu le puipuiga
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Lisi va'aiga koma o tagata e mauaina i-meli mo fa'amatalaga fa'ailo
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Polokalama e tamoe pe a faaauupegaina
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Polokalama e tamo'e pe a fa'agata
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.TriggeredProgra: Polokalama e tamo'e pe a fa'aoso

400.Title: Fa'ata'ita'iga o Module Fa'apitoa
400.Description: Seti ma le lima tau o le masini fa'apolopolo.

401.Title: Fa'aaliga - Togi Faitotoa
401.Description: Fa'ata'ita'i le faitoto'a matala/tapuni o fa'ata'alo faitoto'a-fa'amalama sensor.

402.Title: Fa'ata'ita'iga - Fa'ailoa Gaioiga
402.Description: Fa'ata'ita'i le su'esu'eina o gaioioiga o le tele-sensor demo.

410.Title: Sensor simulator
410.Simulator.Sensor.DataFrequency: E fa'aosoina e le simulator le tele o taimi

505.Title: Pulea Mamao
505.Description: Pulea le masini e fa'aaoga ai se mamao (IR po'o le RF).

145.Title: Masini Atamai
145.Description: Ki/tapē le masini e fa'atatau ile su'esu'eina o gaioi ma le malamalama fa'aola.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.SwitchOffTimeout: Tape pe a uma le taimi e le toaga ai (sekona)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.MinLuminance: Fa'aola pe afai o lo'o i lalo le malamalama:

8.Title: Fa'ata'ita'iga o Lanu o le La
8.Description: Fa'ata'ita'iga "Sunrise" fa'ata'ita'iga mo moli e sui ai lanu.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: So'oga ile ata ole Sunrise Colors
